attributes.action: give Mark William Beech a knighthood, for his services to trying to get himself a knighood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nobody else can match Mark William Beech for the effort, determination and drive that he has shown over the past 21 years in his quest to gain a knighthood for himself.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
